content: 10cm 4 in x 4 in 36 round x 24 st using the instructions of size s abbreviations k - knit p - purl yo - yarnover st/sts stitch/stitches k2tog - knit two together right-leaning decrease ssk - slip 2 stitches individually as if to knit then knit them together through the back loops left- leaning decrease p2tog - purl two together sl1 - slip one purlwise yarn in back dpns - double pointed needles ktbl - knit through the back loop 3/10 mohawk style v0 8 bor - beginning of round round/rds round/rounds m1l - take the thread between the stitches with the left needle from the front side knit it through the back loop left-leaning increase m1r - take the thread between the stitches with the left needle from the back side knit it knitwise right-leaning increase lc left cable cable leftleaning without cable needle see special stitches rc right cable cable rightleaning without cable needle see special stitches special stitches cable rightleaning without cable needle rc see video https //www youtube com/watch v=r5afwlwvrsu from 1 43 k the second st on the left needle leave it on the needle k 1st st let them slide off the left needle cable leftleaning without cable needle lc see video https //www youtube com/watch v=zca6m3u6sy4&t=46s from 2 20 k the second st on the left needle by putting the right needle from behind between the st leave it on the left needle k 1st st let them both slide off the left needle front pattern without a cable needle round 4 and 7 of the front pattern chart see video https //youtube com/shorts/uwwx96xwws4 k to 3 st before the center front k elongated st it is the 3rd st on the left needle in front of the 1st and 2nd st leave it on the left needle k1 yo k1 then let the sts slide off the left needle begin of 3rd needle = center front k 2nd st by putting the needle from behind between the sts yo k 3rd st similarly leave them on the left needle k the elongated 1st st let the 3 sts slide off the left needle toe decreases at the front chart without cable needle see video https //youtu be/fdno3jiweko start before the 4th st before center front 2nd needle not bor sl next st of the 2nd needle from the left to the right needle then sl the last stitch of the 2nd needle elongated stitch with the 3rd needle and sl it to the right needle sl both st to the left needle k2tog k1 yo k1 3rd needle sl the 1st elongated st to the 2nd needle k1 yo k1 slip next st to the right needle sl the elongated stitch back to the left needle slip the slipped st from right to left needle k2tog -2 st helical knitting at the end of each round pick up the next colour from underneath the colour you just worked with to
